title: Lynda.com - Samsung.Galaxy.Note.Tips.and.Tricks
description:
Samsung Galaxy Note Tips and Tricks
Author: Dan Gookin
Duration: 1h 7m 
Date: Sep 17, 2014

The Galaxy Note has become the blockbuster Android tablet, but there's more to this tablet than meets the eye. This course helps Galaxy Note users like you uncover cool features and hidden gems that will enhance your enjoyment and maybe even your productivity with the Galaxy Note. It includes "magical" S Pen tips, tactics for organizing and using apps, tricks for taking great pictures and videos, and cool customization and configuration tips. Start exploring your Galaxy now.

Want to learn more about the operating system driving the Galaxy Note? Check out author Dan Gookin's Android Essential Trainingcourse.

Topics include:
-Writing with the S Pen
-Using Action Memo
-Viewing multiple open apps in MultiWindow
-Taking a panorama
-Working with widgets
-Exploring with Google Now
